General.Name: Wha Yu Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Wha Yu Industrial Co., Ltd. provides antenna products for wireless transmission industry in Taiwan. The company offers telecommunication BTS, in building coverage optimization, outdoor coverage optimization, GPS, automotive, Wi-Fi, LTE, walkie talkie, various embedded, military, maritime, telematics, mmWave active, handheld game console, small cell, and dispenser antennas, as well as electronic cables and BSD blind spot detection radars. It also provides electronic manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.326, Kung Tao 5 Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30070
